name: The Dark Veil: West Haven
detailed_description:
The Dark Veil: West Haven, is a Dark Fantasy Survival Horror that brings a fresh, yet familiar take on the classic survival horror genre.

Take on the role of Cyrus Tyllman, a weathered man in search for answers in an unfamiliar continent called Azdriel, which is covered in a mysterious, dark, mist-like fog. Along the way he will meet new unique characters, fight otherworldly enemies, and uncover deep dark secrets as he searches for hope.

Current Features:

- A mysterious deep story in a dark atmosphere

- Third-Person Fixed-Camera system



- Melee styled combat
about_the_game:
The Dark Veil: West Haven, is a Dark Fantasy Survival Horror that brings a fresh, yet familiar take on the classic survival horror genre.

Take on the role of Cyrus Tyllman, a weathered man in search for answers in an unfamiliar continent called Azdriel, which is covered in a mysterious, dark, mist-like fog. short_description: In this Third-Person Survival Horror, Azdriel writhes underneath the mysterious Dark Veil. Cyrus continues on his mission to track down a powerful wizard in hopes of procuring a magical item to save his wife. While traveling Cyrus gets detoured from his path and is forced to enter West Haven.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
